module.name: Announcements
module.changelog: *0.5* chaned to jump to ivr's return context *0.4* Added Don't Answer option to not answer the channel (and playback early media if supported) *0.3* Added support to return to calling IVR *0.2* First Module Intro
module.description: Plays back one of the system recordings (optionally allowing the user to skip it) and then goes to another destination.
